person:biography.p: Seva is a Software Engineer at since 2001.

First 5 years he was involved in e-Biz team @ Zend (PHP backend web + intra), gaining experience with various web technologies and techniques, e.g. PHP 4/5, LAMP integration, XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, SOA, AJAX etc.
In 2006 he joined Development Tools group to contribute his knowledge and experience in PHP and Web to develop new generation of IDE for PHP oriented Web development.
Since the beginning of 2008 Seva is an independent part-time contributor to the PDT
